name: Slider Sloppy Joes
description: Small Sloppy Joes are irresistible to both kids and adults.

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, turkey, chicken, or soy

preparation: In a frying pan, cook meat and onion over medium-high heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Stir in Burger Seasoning, pasta sauce, vinegar, and brown sugar. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and simmer to let flavours blend, approximately 8–10 minutes.
Place bottoms of buns on plates, then spoon mixture overtop. Cover with top buns.
tips: Flavour Changer: Try Epicure Beef & Steak Seasoning, or give it a Mexican twist with Epicure Taco or Fajita Seasoning, instead of Burger Seasoning.
Serving Suggestion: Joes go great with baked Epicure Oven Fries or our Diner-Style Wedge Salad.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
